description:
Take a look at how you can achieve social media marketing success on this social media marketing training!

Your business needs a presence where your customers are. This 90 minute video training course takes you on a social media tour, showing you how to build your strategy, the best ways to market on Twitter and Facebook, how to measure your results, and what to do with the information. Along the way you’ll discover great opportunities for niche marketing, learn the dos and don'ts, and find out what you need to monitor consistently. You’ll see how your business can benefit!

Develop a plan and build a framework

Manage your social media schedule

Create memorable content

Use Twitter effectively

Assess minor social platforms

Analyze your data

Take this ultimate Social Media for Dummies course now and learn how to leverage social media.

</p>
title: Social Media Marketing For Dummies Video Training
